name: Mike
review: Super easy to use. Super easy to clean. Small enough that it does not take up too much room.

name: Nikolina
review: I had few coffee machines previously. Ever since I got this one, I love it! It is quite and really easy to maintain. Highly recommend this coffee machine

name: Yash
review: This machine makes perfect coffee everytime. My only (small) issue with this machine is that it is a bit loud.

name: Susan
review: Love the machine. Very easy to use. Can control the level of froth the machine makes. Super easy to clean and takes little space. And makes great coffees. Cannot live without it.

name: Kaycee
review: Saves me a lot of money that I previously had to spend on daily coffees. Very smooth process and high quality results, however frequently glitches and I have to do a factory reset.

name: Shawn
review: I am thoroughly impressed by this little machine and the gorgeous hot aromatic cups of coffee it effortlessly produces. So simple and easy to operate, even easier to clean.

name: Mary
review: I love my new Nespresso coffee machine. I can make hot or cold frothed milk for freddo or hot cappucinos. Also very compact and sleek looking on my kitchen bench.

name: Ronaldo
review: Purchased one of these 6 or 7 years ago and probably made 6000+ great coffees with it. Had to purchase the same again and very happy with it from the start.

name: Brent
review: We are really happy with the coffee machine, always use the Nespresso coffee pods and always get a good coffee every morning with no complaints.
